comments:
When only installing the g-Eclipse core feature without any additional or middleware-specific features an exception occures when opening the user perspective. This may be due to the fact that the GlueInfoViewer is not part of the core feature. Here is the exception:

org.eclipse.ui.PartInitException: View descriptor not found: eu.geclipse.gridbench.views.GlueInfoViewer

This problem is not only user-perspective specific. It also occurs when trying to open the developer or operator perspective. Since the GlueInfoView is the problem I am reassigning this problem to Cyprus. Maybe we have to think about moving the GlueInfoView out of gridbench and into another plug-in. Harald, please evaluate this problem within your team.
